cyclone.name: LAURA
cyclone.current_location: about 360 mi SSE of Lake Charles, Louisiana and about 380 mi SE of Galveston, Texas
cyclone.trajectory: tracking west-northwest, turning northwest toward the upper Texas and southwest Louisiana coasts
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: upper Texas / southwest Louisiana coastline near the TX-LA border

weather_observation.watch_coast: Storm-surge and hurricane watches extend east of Intracoastal City LA to west of Morgan City LA; storm-surge watch from Freeport TX to the mouth of the Mississippi River and along coastal MS waters.
weather_observation.warning_coast: Storm-surge warning San Luis Pass TX to mouth of the Mississippi River. Hurricane warning San Luis Pass TX to Intracoastal City LA. Tropical-storm warning Sargent TX to San Luis Pass and east of Intracoastal City LA to the mouth of the Mississippi River.
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Upper Texas coast, southwest Louisiana coast, inland to Arkansas and the lower Mississippi Valley
weather_observation.wind: Minimal winds expected; tropical-storm-force winds not forecast for PortMiami, FL
weather_observation.other_hazards: Elevated rip-current risk possible along Florida east-coast beaches due to distant swells, but port impact negligible
